channel.title: design on LJ-Left Creations Blog
channel.description: Recent content in design on LJ-Left Creations Blog

item.title: Ask-EHR
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: ASK-EHR Throughout March 1-2 2025, I was in a team of 12 to create a streamlined search directory with AI chatbot features. Nikunj created the idea, then attracted us into the project. Then, he split the team into story use cases, backend coding, frontend coding and testing and presentation. I was assigned as vice manager, checking the progress of the programme and the presentation. In the end, we made a working prototype, that I taught them all HuggingFace and a London person taught me Streamlit, and this was the results.

item.title: Pythagorised Score Up
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Play Pythagorised Scoreup! This is my game, Pythagorised Scoreup, built with Pygame and running in your browser thanks to Pygbag! Choose 10 cards for the base, then another 10 for the height. Your final score is the square root of the ‘square of the hypotenuse equalling to the sums of the squares on the other two sides’. E.g. Base score is 3, Height score is 4, Hypotenuse and your score is 5 (âˆš(3Â² + 4Â² = 25))

item.title: NGO Skiller Prototype
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: https://github.com/thatisdrtruman/skiller-UX-UI I completed this one night, for an unsuccessful project, which shows the prototype of the project in the case of the volunteer (the user with the lowest file editing rights, i.e. non-admin, temporary) You can test the prototype by downloading on this website: https://github.com/thatisdrtruman/skiller-UX-UI/archive/refs/heads/main.zip It teaches User Experience, User Interface design and shows concretely the flow and the expected actions for the user, for users to understand the flow and what they expect to see.

item.title: Shake to Quack
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: ðŸ¦†ðŸ¦† Play it here: https://thatisdrtruman.github.io/shake_to_quack_html/ For Android users, Download You can also see how I made ‘Shake To Quack’ with Godot 3.5.3 with C# Support. https://github.com/thatisdrtruman/shake-to-quack How I decided to make it One day on Tiktok, I came across a Tokyo Disneyland Glu Glu Quacking Stick for the theme park’s Quacky City event, celebrating Donald Duck’s 90th anniversary. For a while, I wanted to make a game or an app on Godot and with C#, and I decided to prove myself I can code in C#, with an app version of the Stick.

item.title: Canva Collection 1
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Business Card When you go onto the blog homepage, you will see both sides of the business I give, and I can edit them when I update them. Podcast Cover https://thatisdrtruman.github.io/posts/the-lj-left-creations-projects-podcast-ep0/ In this link, you will find the podcast cover, which I made using Canva, it captures my favourite colours, stand out words and my logo and the simple background. Landing Page Click on homepage at the top, you will go to my landing page, powered by Canva.

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.3
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is the fourth post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here, or the third To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now have a browser version: Site for web app I now added ten checkboxes to mark in your player’s inventory. Whether you already have one of the items and/or abilities. And there is a new Coordinate generator.

item.title: Fillup Status Site
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Fillup-status-app but in a browser, internet required: Your HP: 20 Roll Moves Roll Coordinates Your coordinates: , Your abilities: Stomp Block Slide Teleport Triple Punch Your items: Lasoo Wall Mine Spear HP Bottle (Use: +5HP) To download the Android APK, go here, if you’re on PC and want to play it offine, save this page as a single file

item.title: I Can Make You A Website
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: https://www.fiverr.com/joe_liu_devmake/ MORE TO COME I now make your blog and/or portfolio website, like mine. If you want one, go to the fiverr website or contact me by pressing ‘Contact Me’ in the header. I take about 2-3 weeks to make it, starting at US$450, but if that’s too expensive, send me a form here, start the message with: –Blog/portfolio website discount– and you can have a website for cheaper.

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.1
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 01/02/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.2 This is the third post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now I have a browser version: Site for web app I now added two EditText boxes to mark in your player’s coordinates, bolded the title and slightly condense them features together. The HP bar (the number changes as you use the slider)

item.title: LJ-Left Creations
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: I have just made a Facebook Page of my creative, media and technological enterprise. It will be where I will upload all my creations, and the progress of them. The page will also have links to try out my some free content, and in the future, how to buy other contents. Also, my Facebook tag now links to my ‘LJ-Left Creations’ page. Link: https://www.facebook.com/people/LJ-Left-Creations-by-Joe-Liu/61555492546128/ Black Version: White Version:

item.title: Fillup Status App
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 01/02/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.2 This is the second post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, or here for the third post To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now, use browser version: Site for web app I made this app to organise my game better, by allowing players to roll their moves dice and slide their Health Point themselves. So far, only on Android 5.

item.title: Bejin Bot
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: FREE DOWNLOAD WIP (Still need texture and animation and bio) Bejin Bot A robot designed in Blender inspired by a robot from an Australian animator. Download here Still deciding how to colour it, and its purpose in a game, art or story. Name derived from ‘Begin’, ‘g’ soften to ‘j’, to reference my first character design in Blender. Other model pics of Bejin Bot: Update pending. model-download There you are, this version of Bejin Bot is fully copyleft

item.title: Sticky Note Cards and Game
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: ðŸ’ŒðŸ‘Œ Sticky Note Cards and Game or HERE I always believe regardless of price, something homemade or unbought always has some soul, a priceless item. Simple to make: make an art with sticky notes and bookmarks, write your message or picture, and cover it with lots of redundant sticky notes for a game. If you remove the redundant notes correctly, you will get the right picture and message. If you would like a personalised card in this style, DM me on Linkedin, Facebook, or Tiktok, starting the message with “I would like a sticky note card.

item.title: Fillup
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 22 Jan 2024: After playing the game with some people and reviewing how to be more organised, I have made a Fillup Status app for players to track their HP and roll the dice themselves for the number of moves. Download it here or on ‘Fillup Status App’ page. A game I made in July to January 2023-24, now in its testing phase. The manual and documentation: https://shorturl.at/kuX29

item.title: My designed logo
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Look at the logo in the top left, or in the mobile’s case, the top. That is my logo. Being an Asian person, my name would be Liu Zu (Zu became Joe, which is formally Joseph). Swap over the positions of my western name, reading right to left, like Modern Arabic and ancient Chinese. That is how I named my business and my logo. To conclude, the name and the logo reflects my cultural upbringing with at-time-of-writing modern attractiveness and simplicity.

item.title: PECSOnline
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: PECSOnline PECSOnline was a software I made for my individual Bachelor’s Computer Science Degree project. If you want me to remake it for your use: Direct Contact me via any of my social media accounts (starting your message with: “Subject: Remake PECSOnline”) If you can’t see it: https://archive.org/embed/joseph-liu-pecs-online-playthrough The app was usable on the PC, on phone and tablet, via the internet and a browser app. It had user and child adding/modifying, PECS 1-3 or single symbols and 4-6 or sentence making.

item.title: Grabo
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: In July/August 2023, I worked on a My First Game Jam project called Grabo. Inspired by Kingdom Hearts III using Unreal Engine 4, I wanted to make an Unreal Engine 5 Game as a general 2D platformer. Grabo, a beartrap in a 2D platformer who needs to destroy all melty liquid vats. This is written in Unreal Engine 5.2.1 as a 2023 My First Game Jam entry ( https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2023 ).
